entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 33 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Wednesday 01 March 2023
